panel.introDescription: Explore the circus space to discover the show, the director, the troupe, the rigs and the costumes.

center.title: The Flying Marlon Cáceres
center.description: Art, precision and trust in mid-air. From here you can move around the circus space and discover the director, the troupe, the rigs and the costumes.

trapecio.title: Trapeze platform
trapecio.description: Area dedicated to high-flying acts: risky jumps, combinations in the air and the signature transitions of the Flying Cáceres team.

publico.title: From the audience
publico.description: View designed to showcase show videos, highlight reels and promotional material for festivals, theaters and large events.

entrada.title: Our Director – Marlon Joel Cáceres
entrada.description: At 28, he is the creative heart of the troupe: director and trapeze artist who pushes the art of trapeze to new heights, combining bold staging with a strong visual identity, with experience in over 25 countries.

vestidores.title: Costumes
vestidores.description: Each costume is designed to enhance movement, identity and the brightness of every act. Our resident designer also creates custom pieces for shows around the world.

equipos.title: Our trapeze rigs
equipos.description: Each troupe is the result of years of dedication, rigorous training and passion for flying. International-level trapeze formations designed to execute high-risk routines with precision, timing and elegance.

utileria.title: Props and technical resources
utileria.description: Ideal space to include technical sheets, rigging requirements, minimum structure dimensions and support materials for producers and tech crews.

contacto.title: Contact & bookings
contacto.description: Tell us about your event and we’ll get back to you with the best show proposal. You can also reach us directly via email or WhatsApp.
